name: 15 Quick Recipes for Easy Lenten Dinners
Capirotada
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '2 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'packed light brown sugar, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': None, 'name': 'cinnamon sticks'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': None, 'name': 'loaves bolillo bread, sliced ½-inch thick, toasted (about 24 ounces)'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded Oaxaca cheese (about 12 ounces)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'peanuts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raisins'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cloves, or to taste'}

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'uncooked spaghetti'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'red pepper flakes, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh Italian parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 10 to 12 minutes. Drain and transfer to a pasta bowl.. While the pasta is cooking, combine olive oil and garlic in a cold skillet.. Cook over medium heat to slowly toast garlic, about 10 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low when olive oil begins to bubble. Cook and stir until garlic is golden brown, about another 5 minutes. Remove from heat.. Stir red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper into pasta.. Pour in hot olive oil and garlic, and sprinkle on Italian parsley and half of the Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese; toss until combined.. Serve pasta topped with the remaining Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.

name: Spanakopita (Greek Spinach Pie)
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'green onions, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'spinach, rinsed and chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crumbled feta cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ricotta cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'eggs, lightly beaten'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'sheets', 'name': 'phyllo dough'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil, or as needed'}

name: Spinach Quiche
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(10 ounce) package', 'name': 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(4.5 ounce) can', 'name': 'mushrooms, drained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) package', 'name': 'herb and garlic feta, crumbled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'shredded Cheddar cheese, divided'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'deep-dish pie shell'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'milk'}

name: Louisiana Crawfish Boil
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'heads', 'name': 'garlic, unpeeled'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bay leaves'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(3 ounce) packages', 'name': 'dry crab boil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'liquid shrimp and crab boil seasoning'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '15', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red potatoes, washed'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'oranges, halved'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'lemons, halved'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'whole artichokes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(16 ounce) packages', 'name': 'mushrooms, cleaned'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh green beans, trimmed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'onions, sliced'}, {'quantity': '30', 'unit': 'pieces', 'name': 'baby corn'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(16 ounce) packages', 'name': 'smoked sausage, cut into ½ inch slices'}, {'quantity': '50', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'live crawfish, rinsed well'}

name: Broiled Scallops
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'bay scallops'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'melted butter, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'garlic salt'}
steps: Preheat the broiler to high heat.. Rinse scallops and place in a shallow baking pan. Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons melted butter, lemon juice, and garlic salt.. Broil in the preheated broiler until scallops begin to turn golden, 6 to 8 minutes. Remove from the oven and serve with extra melted butter on the side for dipping.

name: Spaghetti Cacio e Pepe
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'spaghetti'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1 ¾', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'grated Pecorino Romano cheese'}
steps: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti in boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes. Reserve 1 cup cooking water, then drain spaghetti.. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir garlic and pepper in hot oil until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes. Add cooked spaghetti and Pecorino Romano cheese. Ladle in 1/2 cup reserved cooking water; stir until cheese is melted, about 1 minute. Stir in more cooking water as needed, 1 tablespoon at a time, until sauce coats spaghetti, about 1 minute more.

name: Why Isn't Fish Considered Meat During Lent?
Lemony Steamed Fish
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '(6 ounce)', 'name': 'halibut fillets'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried dill weed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'seasoned salt, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'lemon-pepper seasoning'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lemon juice'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Cut six squares of aluminum foil large enough for each fillet.. Center each fillet on a foil square. Season with dill, onion powder, parsley, paprika, seasoned salt, lemon-pepper seasoning, and garlic powder, then sprinkle with lemon juice. Fold the foil squares around the fillets to make pockets. Fold the edges to seal. Place sealed packets onto a baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 30 minutes.

name: Chef John's Salmon Loaf
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'salted butter'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced onion'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(7 ounce) cans', 'name': 'red salmon, drained'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely crushed saltine cracker crumbs'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'eggs'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Generously butter a loaf pan.. Melt butter over medium heat in a saute pan until bubbling. Toss in onion, give the pan a quick shake, and stir with a wooden spoon; cook for 1 minute. Turn off the heat and allow to cool.. Place salmon in a large mixing bowl and mash with a fork. Add cracker crumbs, salt, cayenne pepper, Worcestershire sauce, rice vinegar, butter, and onions; mix and mash with a spatula or spoon until smooth.. Separate eggs, adding whites to a clean glass, metal, or ceramic bowl and adding yolks to salmon mixture. Mix egg yolks and salmon until well combined.. Whisk whites to medium stiff peaks. Gently fold into salmon mixture in 2 additions.. Transfer salmon mixture into the prepared loaf pan. Smooth the top with a spatula to even it out and shake and tap the pan to remove any air bubbles.. Bake in the center of the preheated oven until a toothpick comes out clean, about 45 minutes. Let rest for 5 minutes, then carefully turn loaf out onto a cutting board. Slice and serve.

name: Potato and Egg Casserole
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'potatoes'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'seasoning salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'margarine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) container', 'name': 'sour cream'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain and let cool.. While the potatoes are cooking, cover eggs in a saucepan and with cold water. Bring water to a boil, then immediately remove from heat. Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes. Remove eggs from hot water and place under cold running water to cool.. Slice potatoes. Peel and slice eggs.. Starting and ending with potatoes, layer potatoes and eggs in a 9x13-inch casserole dish, sprinkling each layer of eggs with seasoning salt.. Cook and stir sour cream and margarine in a small saucepan over low heat until melted. Pour over casserole and sprinkle lightly with seasoning salt.. Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.

name: Lemon Pepper Cod
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'cod fillets'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium high heat until hot. Add fillets and squeeze 1/2 of the lemon's juice over the tops. Sprinkle with pepper to taste. Cook for 4 minutes and turn. Squeeze with the remaining lemon's juice and sprinkle with pepper to taste. Continue to cook until fillets flake easily with a fork.

name: Creamy Asparagus Pasta
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2 inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'light cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'linguine pasta'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}
steps: Bring a medium pot of water to a boil. Cook asparagus in boiling water until bright green and slightly crisp, 3 to 4 minutes; drain.. Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Sauté asparagus and garlic in hot butter for 3 to 4 minutes. Stir in cream and simmer for 10 minutes.. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook linguine in boiling water until tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes; drain and transfer to a serving dish.. Stir lemon juice into asparagus mixture; pour mixture over hot pasta.

name: Chef John's Salmon Cakes
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14.75 ounce) can', 'name': 'red salmon, skin and bone removed, drained and flaked'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped capers'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'saltine crackers'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'bread crumbs, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}
steps: Stir salmon, eggs, lemon juice, capers, salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl until well-combined.. Crush saltine crackers with your hands into the salmon mixture and mix well. Wrap the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate, 30 minutes to overnight.. Dust a plate with half the bread crumbs. Divide salmon mixture into 4 portions and shape into patties; place onto prepared plate and sprinkle remaining bread crumbs atop the salmon patties.. Melt butter and oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook patties in hot oil until cooked and heated through, about 5 minutes per side.

name: Spinach Cheese Pie
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(9 inch)', 'name': 'pie crusts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(10 ounce) package', 'name': 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '15', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'ricotta cheese'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'mozzarella cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'diced Cheddar cheese'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Press bottom pie crust into a glass pie dish.. Combine spinach, salt, pepper, and nutmeg in a large bowl. Add ricotta, mozzarella, Parmesan, and Cheddar cheeses. Mix together well and pour into the bottom pie crust. Place second pie crust on top of filling, seal and trim edges.. Bake in the preheated oven for 40 minutes. Let stand for 10 minutes and cut into wedges.

name: Spinach and Cheese Stuffed Pasta Shells
ingredients: {'quantity': '32', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jumbo pasta shells'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ricotta cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(10 ounce) packages', 'name': 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fennel seed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '3 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'spaghetti sauce'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Gently place pasta shells in boiling water; return water to a boil. Cook until shells are just tender; drain well.. Squeeze spinach dry and place in a large mixing bowl. Add ricotta, 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese, fennel, basil, and garlic. Season with salt and pepper; mix well.. Spread 1/2 cup spaghetti sauce evenly over the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.. Fill each pasta shell with spinach-cheese mixture. Arrange shells, filling-side up, in the baking dish. Spoon remaining spaghetti sauce over shells. Sprinkle remaining Parmesan cheese on top of shells.. Cover the pan loosely with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven until heated through, about 30 minutes.

name: Overnight Asparagus Mushroom Strata
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'butter, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '1 ¾', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'sliced crimini mushrooms'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'English muffins, split and toasted'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped red bell pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dry mustard powder'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}
steps: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms; cook and stir until beginning to brown and most of their liquid has evaporated, about 10 minutes.. Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish. Arrange eight muffin halves, cut-side up, in the bottom of the dish. Tear remaining muffins into smaller pieces and use to fill any open spaces. Sprinkle with 1/2 of the cheese, then top with asparagus pieces, mushrooms, red pepper, and onion.. Whisk milk, eggs, salt, mustard powder, and black pepper together in a bowl; pour over muffins and vegetables. Cover the dish and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.. The next day, remove the casserole from the refrigerator and let stand for 30 minutes. Spread remaining cheese over the top.. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven until a knife inserted near the edge comes out clean, 40 to 45 minutes. Let stand for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into squares.

name: Chef John's Pasta con le Sarde
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil, divided'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dry bread crumbs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'saffron'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white wine'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'bucatini pasta'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced yellow onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced fennel bulb'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'golden raisins'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'anchovy fillet'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'toasted pine nuts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(4 ounce) cans', 'name': 'sardines packed in oil, drained and crumbled'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fennel fronds, or more to taste'}
steps: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add bread crumbs; cook and stir until crispy and toasted, 2 to 5 minutes. Transfer bread crumbs to a bowl.. Grind saffron threads with a mortar and pestle; pour white wine into the mortar and stir to combine.. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook bucatini in boiling water, stirring occasionally, until almost fully cooked through but still firm to the bite, 10 to 11 minutes. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup of the pasta water.. Heat remaining 4 tablespoons olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, fennel, and salt; cook and stir until onion is soft, about 10 minutes. Add raisins, garlic, and anchovy; cook and stir until heated through, about 1 minute.. Pour wine mixture into the skillet and cook until almost evaporated, about 2 minutes. Pour 1 ladleful reserved pasta water into the skillet and bring to a simmer. Stir in pine nuts and red pepper flakes; simmer until flavors combine and sauce is reduced, about 5 minutes.. Stir bucatini and sardines into the skillet. Increase the heat to high and cook, stirring frequently and adding more reserved pasta water as necessary, until sauce and pasta are heated through, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat.. Ladle into bowls and top with fennel fronds and toasted bread crumbs.

name: Sweet Matzo Brei
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'matzo sheets'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'milk, or more as needed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'ground cinnamon, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}
steps: Pass matzo sheets one at a time under cool running water briefly, then crumble into a large bowl. Stir in milk, eggs, cinnamon, sugar, and vanilla to form an evenly moist batter. Add more milk if batter is too dry.. Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Scoop a generous spoonful of batter into hot butter and flatten with the back of a spatula. Cook until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes per side. Repeat with remaining batter.

name: Real New Orleans-Style BBQ Shrimp
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'medium shrimp, with shells'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'sweet onion, minced'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'stalks', 'name': 'celery, diced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'Creole seasoning'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried rosemary'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Arrange the shrimp in a single layer in as many baking dishes as you need. Set aside.. Melt 1/2 cup of butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, celery, parsley, Creole seasoning, and rosemary. Cook and stir for a few minutes, until onion is tender. Add rest of butter and cook until melted over low heat. Stir in pepper, Worcestershire sauce, and lemon juice. Pour this mixture over shrimp so that shrimp are completely submerged.. Bake in the preheated oven until shrimp are pink, 15 to 20 minutes.

name: What Is a Friday Fish Fry?
Chef John's Baked Eggs
ingredients: {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'marinara sauce'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'finely shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'toast'}
steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Spoon marinara sauce into the bottom of a small baking dish, about 1/4 inch high. Sprinkle with red pepper flakes, salt, black pepper, and parsley. Make a narrow well in the center of the sauce for the eggs.. Crack each egg into a ramekin, then pour into the baking dish over the marinara sauce.. Sprinkle with Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, olive oil, and cream. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.. Bake in the preheated oven until yolks are just set, 10 to 12 minutes. Serve with toast.

name: Potato Curry
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'ghee'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cumin seeds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'turmeric'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground coriander'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'mustard seed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'potatoes, peeled and diced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'yogurt'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen green peas'}
steps: Heat the ghee in a skillet over medium heat, and mix in the cumin, turmeric, coriander, salt, mustard seed, and cayenne pepper. Place potatoes in the skillet, and stir to evenly coat with the ghee. Cook 10 minutes, stirring often. Pour water into the skillet. Reduce heat to low, and simmer 30 minutes, until potatoes are tender.. Mix the yogurt and peas into the saucepan. Continue cooking until heated through.

name: Mediterranean-Style Eggplant Pasta
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggplant, cut into 3/4-inch slices'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt as needed'}, {'quantity': '9', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'pappardelle pasta (wide fettuccine noodles)'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(18 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'red wine vinegar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh buffalo mozzarella cheese, torn into pieces'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh basil, or more to taste'}
steps: Arrange eggplant slices in a colander and sprinkle with enough salt to lightly coat; drain for about 10 minutes. Rinse eggplant and pat dry with paper towels. Chop eggplant into cubes.. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pappardelle at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 10 to 11 minutes; drain.. Heat 1 1/2 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir eggplant, adding more oil if eggplant gets dry, until browned, 5 to 10 minutes. Transfer eggplant to a bowl, reserving oil in the skillet.. Heat remaining oil in the same skillet; cook and stir onion and garlic until golden, about 10 minutes. Return eggplant to skillet and season with oregano; cook and stir for 1 minute more.. Mix tomatoes, vinegar, salt, sugar, and black pepper into eggplant mixture; cover skillet and simmer sauce until eggplant is softened, about 10 minutes. Mix sauce with pasta in a bowl; top with mozzarella cheese and basil.

name: The Best Veggie Sandwich
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'English muffins, split and toasted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'avocado, mashed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'alfalfa sprouts'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'tomato, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'sweet onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'Ranch-style salad dressing'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'toasted sesame seeds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded smoked Cheddar cheese'}
steps: Preheat oven to broil.. Place each muffin open-faced on a cookie sheet. Spread each half with mashed avocado; place halves close together. Distributing ingredients evenly, cover each half with sprouts, tomatoes, onion, dressing, sesame seeds and cheese.. Place under broiler for about 5 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.

name: Potato Lasagna
ingredients: {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'red potatoes, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': '', 'name': 'baby carrots, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'green bell pepper, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Vidalia onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'baby spinach leaves'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded smoked Gouda cheese'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded sharp Cheddar cheese'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) jar', 'name': 'vodka marinara sauce'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 2 quart casserole dish.. In a medium bowl, toss together the carrots, bell pepper, onion, garlic, and spinach. In a separate bowl, blend together the Gouda cheese, mozzarella cheese, and sharp Cheddar cheese. Set aside.. Place two layers of sliced potatoes in the bottom of the prepared casserole dish. Season the potatoes with a little salt and pepper. Top with a layer of the spinach mixture, and pour about 1/2 cup of sauce over all. Sprinkle with some of the cheese blend. Repeat layering with remaining potatoes, vegetables, sauce and cheese, ending with cheese on the top.. Bake covered for 35 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove the lid, and bake for 10 more minutes until the top is browned.

name: Eggs Poached in Tomato Sauce
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dry red wine, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bay leaf, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}
steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes.. Stir tomato sauce, red wine, parsley, basil, oregano, salt, pepper, bay leaf, and red pepper flakes with the onion and garlic; bring to a simmer, reduce heat to low, and cook until the sauce has thickened, about 45 minutes.. Crack eggs into a bowl one at a time and gently slide them into the tomato sauce; cook until beginning to firm, 2 to 3 minutes. Spoon sauce over the eggs to cover. Place a lid on the skillet and simmer until sauce has thickened, about 30 minutes.

name: Jumbo Shrimp and Asparagus
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'bunches', 'name': 'asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '24', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'fresh shrimp, peeled, deveined and cut in half lengthwise'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh ginger root'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'soy sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'granulated sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dry sherry'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: In a medium saucepan, bring two cups of water to a boil. Cook asparagus in boiling water for 3 minutes. Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons of liquid.. Heat the oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute the shrimp pieces until the color changes, about 3 to 5 minutes. Stir in asparagus with reserved liquid , and season with ginger, soy sauce, sugar, sherry and salt to taste. Continue to cook for 5 more minutes.

name: 13 Kid-Friendly Lenten Recipes to Fill Up the Whole Family
Roasted Veggie Pasta
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh asparagus'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'red bell pepper, sliced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'crimini mushrooms, sliced'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'roasted garlic, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tomato, quartered'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh rosemary'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh oregano'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'dry fettuccini noodles'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'tapenade'}
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Prepare asparagus by trimming woody base and cutting diagonally into 4 inch pieces.. In a roasting pan, combine asparagus, bell pepper, mushrooms, roasted garlic and tomato. Sprinkle with rosemary and oregano, then drizzle with olive oil. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes.. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain. Toss with Parmesan cheese, tapenade and roasted vegetables.

name: Eggy Veggie Bake
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced halved zucchini'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green onions, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'sweet onion, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh mushrooms'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chopped baby spinach'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'hot sauce to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'garlic powder to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'liquid egg substitute'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded Cheddar cheese'}
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray an 8x8 inch baking dish with cooking spray.. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Place zucchini, green onions, onion, tomatoes, mushrooms, and spinach in the skillet. Sprinkle with lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and hot sauce. Season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Cook until tender. Transfer to the prepared baking dish. Pour egg substitute over the vegetables in the dish. Top with cheese.. Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until egg substitute is set and cheese is melted. Cut with a spatula and enjoy!

name: Lemon Pepper Pasta Seafood
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'lemon pepper linguine'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'medium shrimp - peeled and deveined'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}
steps: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to boil, add pasta, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente. Drain, and return pasta to the pot.. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook garlic, lemon pepper seasoning, and shrimp in oil until shrimp is cooked through, 3 to 5 minutes.. Toss pasta with shrimp and Parmesan cheese.

name: 12 Simple Shrimp Recipes for Lenten Fridays
Asparagus, Snow Pea, and Radish Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'asparagus, trimmed and cut diagonally into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'snow peas, ends and strings removed, cut diagonally into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '15', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'radishes, trimmed and thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'scallions, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh snipped dill'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'canola oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lime juice, or more to taste'}
steps: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan. Add asparagus; boil for 1 minute. Add snow peas to asparagus, boil for 1 minute more. Drain and pat dry.. Transfer asparagus and snow peas to a large bowl. Add radishes, scallions, and dill; toss salad gently to combine.. Whisk oil, sugar, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl; pour over salad and toss to coat. Set aside at room temperature to allow flavors to blend; about 1 hour. Drizzle lime juice over salad; toss gently until combined.

name: Spinach Ziti
ingredients: {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'ziti pasta'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14.5 ounce) can', 'name': 'Italian-style stewed tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'crushed red pepper flakes'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'fresh spinach, washed and chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'cream cheese'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: Bring a large pot filled with salted water to a boil. Add ziti and cook until tender but still firm, about 12 minutes.. Meanwhile, in a medium sized non-reactive pan, combine tomatoes and hot pepper flakes. Warm over medium-low heat, breaking up tomatoes if necessary.. Drain pasta and return to hot pan. Add spinach, cream cheese and nutmeg. Cook, stirring, over low heat until spinach wilts, 1-2 minutes. Pour tomato sauce over spinach ziti. Stir and toss gently to mix.

name: Blue Cheese and Asparagus Pizza
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'asparagus, trimmed and snapped into pieces'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'olive oil, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pizza sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce)', 'name': 'prebaked pizza crust (such as Boboli®)'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crumbled blue cheese'}
steps: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Place asparagus on a baking sheet; drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.. Bake the asparagus in the preheated oven for 10 minutes.. While asparagus is baking, spread the pizza sauce over the pizza crust. Distribute asparagus pieces and crumbles of blue cheese evenly over the pizza.. Return pizza to center rack of preheated oven; bake until the cheese is melted and bubbling, 8 to 10 more minutes.

name: Will Popeyes' Latest Offering Start a Fish Sandwich War?
